tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Earlier in the year, I broke four bones in my foot in an accident and Dr Khan operated on my foot. Six months down the line I'm happy to report I'm good as new, able to play sports again. This is all thanks to the great work Dr Khan did with my surgery. He was kind and patient throughout my recovery and took the time out to explain every little detail to me. Thank you so much, I'm grateful.

reply_text: Thank you fais . I appreciate u taking time to write about your experience for ur mothers surgery .

review: I had been suffering from 2 trigger thumbs during the lockdown and could not get an appointment to see an orthopaedic, thankfully just after the final lockdown was over I searched the internet and found that Dr Khan was available.  Very few doctors were available at that time.  Dr Khan immediately saw the problem and explained in detail, the problem I had and suggest a small surgery on one of my hands.  It went very well.  He explained every step that was taken, as I had local anaesthetic and put me at ease.  It's been 10 days since the operation and I had movement back in my thumb almost immediately and the pain was gone.  Still need to take the stitches out, but very pleased with the whole experience.
Very good. Takes time to explain the condition and the solution to recovery. He is easily the most friendly doctor

Doctor explained the probable issue very well considering all possible points of lifestyle habits or condition. 
Doctor even shared basic therapeutic exercise for treatment on the very first visit as per grade of condition.

review: I found the doctor to be courteous *** ************** He gives time to the patient to explain the issue.
Dr khan is a orthopaedic surgeon **** ** ********* ******** ***** I strongly recommend him for knee problems like sports injuries (ACL and Meniscus tears) and arthritis.
The doctor was to the point and explained the diagnosis in detail. He was also not one to unnecessarily prescribe medications
